A connections DB reader is an object which allows accessing properties of a single connection contained in the DB

TransitDb

A transit db contains all connections, trips and stops.

A transit db snapshot, represents a consistent state of the transit db.

A writer for the transit db.

Contains extension methods for the transit db.
